activities:
Catalyst Repository Systems, Inc. hosts and processes images, electronic files and related data acting as as a "data processor" on behalf of corporate, insurance and individual clients and their legal counsel. We may provide any of the following services: data collection, data processing, data loading, data hosting.
The data which is stored and/or processed by Catalyst may contain personal information of our clients' employees, partners or any other third party with which our clients may have data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to Catalyst's CEO, John Tredennick (jtredennick@catalystsecure.com) for prompt resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction, Catalyst has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles and participates through registration with the United States Council for International Business.
